name.description: Characters must be [A-Za-z0-9-.] The first and last characters must be [A-Za-z0-9-.]

passphrase.description: Passphrase must be a UTF-8 string excluding spaces, tabs, full-width spaces, newlines, and null characters.

email.description: account email address (only when logged in to an account with viewing privileges)

role.description: account role (only when logged in to an account with viewing privileges)

status.description: account status (only when logged in to an account with viewing privileges)

frozen.description: account frozen status (only when logged in to an account with viewing privileges)

silenced.description: account silenced status (only when logged in to an account with viewing privileges)

created_at.description: account created at (only when logged in to an account with viewing privileges)

is_followed.description: Whether the account is followed by the target account

is_following.description: Whether the account is following the target account

is_follow_requesting.description: Whether a follow request has been sent to the target account
